name: api_rendering_Material

properties.name: color
properties.description: The main color property of the Material.

properties.name: doubleSidedGI
properties.description: Gets and sets whether the Double Sided Global Illumination setting is enabled for this material.

properties.name: enabledKeywords
properties.description: An array containing the local shader keywords that are currently enabled for this material.

properties.name: enableInstancing
properties.description: Gets and sets whether GPU instancing is enabled for this material.

properties.name: globalIlluminationFlags
properties.description: Defines how the material should interact with lightmaps and lightprobes.

properties.name: isVariant
properties.description: Returns true if this material is a material variant.

properties.name: mainTextureOffset
properties.description: Defines the UV offset for the main texture in the Material. This property adjusts the position of the texture mapping on a Mesh surface relative to its UV coordinates.

properties.name: mainTextureScale
properties.description: The scale of the main texture.

properties.name: passCount
properties.description: How many passes are in this material (Read Only).

properties.name: rawRenderQueue
properties.description: Raw render queue of this material.

properties.name: renderQueue
properties.description: The render queue to use as an override on this material.

properties.name: shader
properties.description: The shader used by the material.

properties.name: shaderKeywords
properties.description: An array containing names of the local shader keywords that are currently enabled for this material.
